name: pupal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a pupa (= an insect in the stage of development when it is inside a hard covering, before it becomes an adult): the pupal stage of development When we inspected the trees, we found live gypsy moth egg masses and pupal cases. Compare
larvalSee
pupa
More examplesFewer examplesWe've had a series of mild winters that did not kill the insects during their pupal stages.The beetle remains in its pupal chamber until the following spring.Moths, like butterflies, develop from eggs through larval and pupal stages to adults.
